pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Multivariate Receptor Modeling // Bayesian analysis of multivariate receptor modeling. The package consists of implementations of the methods of Park and Oh (2015) doi:10.1016/j.chemolab.2015.08.021.The package uses 'JAGS'(Just Another Gibbs Sampler) to generate Markov chain Monte Carlo samples of parameters.
